OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupCustom
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Metallurgy 4 Ore Groups.

Choice.Description: Concentrated veins of Salt ore.
Rare, sparsely populated clouds of ore extending over several chunks.

Choice.description: No Quartz is generated at all.

Choice.Description: Concentrated veins of Quartz ore.
Rare, sparsely populated clouds of ore extending over several chunks.

Choice.description: No Quartz is generated at all.

OptionChoice.name: CertusQuartzDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Certus Quartz is generated

Choice.Description: Concentrated veins of Certus Quartz ore.
Rare, sparsely populated clouds of ore extending over several chunks.
Small evenly scattered clusters of ore. This is the standard Certus Quartz generation.

Choice.description: No Certus Quartz is generated at all.

OptionNumeric.name: CertusQuartzFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Certus Quartz distributions

OptionNumeric.name: CertusQuartzSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Certus Quartz distributions

OptionChoice.name: utilityoreDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Utility Ores are generated

Choice.Description: Veins of Ore leading to a Motherlode. Most realistic placement.
Rare, sparsely populated clouds of ore extending over several chunks.
Small evenly scattered clusters of ore. This is the default Minecraft placement pattern.

Choice.description: No utility ores are generated at all.

OptionNumeric.name: utilityoreFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Utility Ore distributions

OptionNumeric.name: utilityoreSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for utility Ore distributions

OptionChoice.name: baseDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Base Ores are generated

Choice.Description: Veins of Ore leading to a Motherlode. Most realistic placement.
Rare, sparsely populated clouds of ore extending over several chunks.
Small evenly scattered clusters of ore. This is the default Minecraft placement pattern.

Choice.description: No base ores are generated at all.

OptionNumeric.name: baseFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Base Ore distributions

OptionNumeric.name: baseSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Base Ore distributions

OptionChoice.name: preciousDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Precious Ores are generated

Choice.Description: Veins of Ore leading to a Motherlode. Most realistic placement.
Rare, sparsely populated clouds of ore extending over several chunks.
Small evenly scattered clusters of ore.

Choice.description: No precious ores are generated at all.

OptionNumeric.name: preciousFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for precious ore distributions

OptionNumeric.name: preciousSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for precious ore distributions

OptionChoice.name: netherDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Nether Ores are generated

Choice.Description: Veins of Ore leading to a Motherlode. Most realistic placement. Only appears in the Nether.
Rare, sparsely populated clouds of ore extending over several chunks. Only appears in the Nether.
Small evenly scattered clusters of ore. This is the default Minecraft placement pattern. Only appears in the Nether.

Choice.description: No nether ores are generated at all.

OptionNumeric.name: netherFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for nether ore distributions

OptionNumeric.name: netherSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for nether ore distributions

OptionChoice.name: enderDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Ender Ores are generated

Choice.Description: Veins of Ore leading to a Motherlode. Most realistic placement. Only appears in the End.
Rare, sparsely populated clouds of ore extending over several chunks. Only appears in the End.
Small evenly scattered clusters of ore. This is the default Minecraft placement pattern. Only appears in the End.

Choice.description: No ender ores are generated at all.

OptionNumeric.name: enderFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Utility Ore distributions

OptionNumeric.name: enderSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for utility Ore distributions

Substitute.name: Metallurgy3OreSubstitute
Substitute.Description: Replace default-generated Metallurgy 4 ore clusters with stone.
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).
Block IDs: Metallurgy:base.ore = Base Ores Metallurgy:precious.ore = Precious Ores Metallurgy:utility.ore = Utility Ores

StandardGen.name: phosphorousStandard
StandardGen.Description: Equivalent to vanilla minecraft ore distribution

Veins.name: phosphorousVeins
Veins.Description: Utility ores spawn just near the surface, and up into hills and mountains. The veins are long and thick, but sparsely filled with ore and often broken up by caves or depressions in the terrain.

Veins.name: phosphorousVeinsElevated
Veins.Description: This provides a second set of veins at the correct height to fill mountains. The branches have more vertical range than the main distribution.

Veins.name: phosphorousVeinsSwamp
Veins.Description: This roughly triples the chance of finding ore in a swamp.

Cloud.name: phosphorousCloud
Cloud.Description: Diffuse ore cloud surrounded by single-block "hint" veins, found in swamps.

StandardGen.name: copperStandard
StandardGen.Description: Equivalent to vanilla minecraft ore distribution

Veins.name: m3copperveins
Veins.Description: Ore spawns in the height 30-50 range. The veins are average in length and size.

Veins.name: m3copperveinsElevated
Veins.Description: This provides a second set of veins at the correct height to fill mountains. The branches have more vertical range than the main distribution.

Veins.name: m3copperveinsCold
Veins.Description: This roughly triples the chance of finding ore in cold/icy biomes.

Cloud.name: copperCloud
Cloud.Description: Diffuse ore cloud surrounded by single-block "hint" veins, found in cold biomes.

StandardGen.name: zincStandard
StandardGen.Description: Equivalent to vanilla minecraft ore distribution

Veins.name: zincVeins
Veins.Description: Ore spawns in the height 10-30 range. The veins are shorter than average, and much rarer overall. Ore is not easy to find.

Veins.name: zincVeinsForest
Veins.Description: This roughly triples the chance of finding ore in forested biomes.

Cloud.name: zincCloud
Cloud.Description: Diffuse ore cloud surrounded by single-block "hint" veins, found in forest biomes.
